E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1991
Subject: Progress of Wilburn Bennett
Dear Sir,
Wilburn Bennett has nothing more to prove at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .276 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/8/1991
Subject: Progress of Robby Digregorio
Dear Sir,
Robby Digregorio is hitting the ball well at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .276, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/26/1991
Subject: Progress of John Karle
Dear Sir,
John Karle has an ERA of 2.00 at AA Springfield Duff!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!
